%vlocity_namespace%__ApplicableUserProfi: #SalesEngineer;#AccountExec;Frontier System Administrator;Frontier Sales User;#CTF Small Business User;#CTF Customer Service Analyst;#Sales Support Rep;#CTF RegionalSalesMgr;#CPE AccountExec;#CTF AccountExec;#BAM - Business Account Manager;#Alternate Channel Leadership;#Alternate Channel Manager;#CPE RegionalSalesMgr;Partner Support Team;#Sales Support Supervisor;Direct Sales Support;System Analyst;Direct Sales Support Admin
%vlocity_namespace%__Filter__c: %vlocity_namespace%__OrderStatus__c IN ('Ready To Submit') AND isEasyPass__c !=true AND Order_Stage__c NOT IN ('IT Review', 'QA Review') AND Products__c INCLUDES ('EIA','EVPL','SIP','Frontier Secure','SDWAN','MNS','E-LAN') AND RecordType.Name !='UCaaS New Order'
Name: Request SE Review
